name: Plugin Name: Count Unique Visitors Widget
author: Faisal Mehmood

sections.description: CUV shows the number of visitors / hits / unique IPs in the past 24 hours, 7 days and 30 days. It also shows the number of users currently online.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the zip to ‘plugins’ directory
  2. Unzip (steps 1 and 2 can also be performed automatically)
  3. Activate the plugin
  4. Configure and place the widget on your sidebar

Count Unique Visitors Widget does not have a settings section on Admin page. However, you can set the fields descriptions on the widget

short_description: CUV lets your users know how much unique IP hits you have on your blog. It counts pages visited, hits and unique IPs on your blog and shows it in a wi …
description: CUV shows the number of visitors / hits / unique IPs in the past 24 hours, 7 days and 30 days. It also shows the number of users currently online.
